name: Sport Drift Car: King Speed
description:
Sport Drift Car: King Speed is a combination of real world circuits and great sensation, experience the extreme racing, there is no death racing but live car race. Amazing racing and drift sounds. Be a furious rally driver on a whole terrain, turn on NOS to overcome difficulties in racing simulation. Chase other cars by being fast and speed.
Features:
- Absolute breathtaking racing game!
- Awesome sensation of high-speed race!
- Classic 3D Graphics!
- Amazing spirit of competition!
- Beautiful racing tracks
